text: jo log apni jaano par zulm karne waale hai, jab farishte un ki ruh qabz karte hai to pochte hai tum kis haal mein thein? ye jawaab dete hai ke hum apni jageh kamzoor aur maghloob thein,farishte kehte hai kya Allah taâ€™ala ki zameen kushaada na thi ke tum hijrath kar jaate? yahi log hai jin ka thikaana dozakh hai aur wo pahonchne ki buri jageh hai
